abstract: Sanofi-Aventis on Monday sent a letter to Genzyme’s chief executive, asking that the biotech giant not seek to block its unsolicited takeover bid by altering its board or using anti-takeover laws in its home state, Massachusetts.
snippet: Sanofi-Aventis on Monday sent a letter to Genzyme’s chief executive, asking that the biotech giant not seek to block its unsolicited takeover bid by altering its board or using anti-takeover laws in its home state, Massachusetts.
lead_paragraph: Sanofi-Aventis on Monday sent a letter to Genzyme’s chief executive, asking that the biotech giant not seek to block its unsolicited takeover bid by altering its board or using anti-takeover laws in its home state, Massachusetts.

headline.main: Sanofi Asks Genzyme to Keep Path to Deal Open

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
